problem_text:
b) Let F be an infinite field or a skew-field. What conditions on the subring R of F will ensure that PGL(d + 1, R) is flag-transitive on the projective d-space PG(d, F)?
P. M. Neumann, C. E. Praeger
answer: b) Such necessary and sufficient conditions are given in (S. A. Zyubin, Siberian Electron. Math. Rep., 11 (2014), 64–69 (Russian)).
